title: How does one write an expert affidavit? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: An affidavit begins with an oath stating you are over the age of 21 and understand the meaning of an oath next you should state that you have been asked to provide your expert opinion on (what you have been asked to opine on) . You can then state what makes you qualified to give your opinion and maybe provide a copy of your resume as an addendum. Next get into the meat of the matter and state the question(s) you were asked to give your opinion followed by a summation of your findings.
